**** Sorry, I had too many copies going, This version is perfect

split into two regular AVI files! 
Gr8t UL, Thanx!

Thanks for sharing and splitting it into two files.  For those of us with slow download times, it's great to be able to get just the half we want and not have to wait a couple of hours for one massive file.
